caption.p: Main findings on phytochemical analysis of Mentha species.

tr.td:

Nghệ an province: -epi-bicyclosesquiphellandrene (52.4%) -limonene (31.4%)

Mature leaves: -menthol (86.87%) - p-cymene (4.38%) -pulegone (3.47%)
